faq.title: What kind of support can we expect during beta?
faq.description: Direct access to our development team, custom implementation support, and priority feature requests consideration.

faq.title: Do we need to integrate with Nurl Play?
faq.description: No, but it's available if you want to gather direct player feedback and usage data.

faq.title: How long is the beta period?
faq.description: The beta program runs through a quarter of the year, with beta partners receiving special benefits post-launch.

faq.title: What happens after beta?
faq.description: Beta partners receive preferred pricing and maintain their direct support channel.
